item.title: Hard Forks of 2023
item.description: Following intense hard fork avalanche in late 2022, there will be at least 5 planned protocol upgrades coming this year.

item.title: Hard Forks of 2022
item.description: Fall season of 2022 was a pretty intense period for crypto engineers & coin node operators - multiple cryptocurrencies have performed major protocol upgrades.
